member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAdditionalChargeOrCredit
member.summary: An additional charge or credit against a housing assignment, in addition to the charge based on the room rate.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAdditionalChargeOrCredit.ArCode
member.summary: The charge code of the additional charge or credit. Must be a valid AR code in the target system. Required.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAdditionalChargeOrCredit.Description
member.summary: A description of the additional charge or credit. Required.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAdditionalChargeOrCredit.Amount
member.summary: The amount of the charge or credit. A positive number is a charge. A negative number is a credit. Required.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment
member.summary: A housing assignment.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the housing assignment in the target system. This must be blank or not supplied when creating a new housing assignment. This or an External Id must be specified when updating an existing housing assignment.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.ExternalIds
member.summary: One or more unique External Ids for the housing assignment.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.PersonId
member.summary: The identifier in the target system of the person assigned to the housing. Required.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.StartDate
member.summary: The start date of the housing assignment. Required.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.EndDate
member.summary: The end date of the housing assignment. Required.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.CurrentStatus
member.summary: The current status of the housing assignment. Must be a valid housing assignment status code in the target system. Required.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.CurrentStatusDate
member.summary: The effective date of the current status of the housing assignment. Required.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.Building
member.summary: The identifier in the target system of the building of the housing assignment.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.Room
member.summary: The identifier in the target system of the room of the housing assignment. If the identifier of the room in the target system is a combination of the building and room identifiers, include only the room part of the identifier.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.TermId
member.summary: The term id of the housing assignment. Must be a valid term id in the target system.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.RoomRateTable
member.summary: The room rate table of the housing assignment. Must be a valid room rate table code in the target system.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.RoomRatePeriod
member.summary: The rate period of the room rate table.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.OverrideRate
member.summary: An override rate that replaces the rate derived from the room rate table. The override rate is per rate period. For instance if the rate period is weekly, the override rate will be multiplied times the number of weeks. A room rate table must be specified if an override rate is specified.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.OverrideRateReason
member.summary: A reason code for an override rate. Must be a valid override reason code in the target system.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.OverrideChargeCode
member.summary: An override AR code for the room assignment rate. Only used if billing is performed by the target system, in which case it replaces the value that would otherwise be assigned by the target system. Must be a valid AR code in the target system.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.OverrideReceivableType
member.summary: An override AR type code for the room assignment rate. Only used if billing is performed by the target system, in which case it replaces the value that would otherwise be assigned by the target system. Must be a valid AR type in the target system.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.OverrideRefundFormula
member.summary: An override refund formula code for the room assignment. Only used if billing is performed by the target system, in which case it replaces the value that would otherwise be assigned by the target system. Must be a valid refund formula code in the target system.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.AdditionalChargesOrCredits
member.summary: A list of additional charges against the housing assignment.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.Contract
member.summary: A unique contract number associated with the housing assignment.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.Comments
member.summary: Comments about the housing assignment.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.ResidentStaffIndicator
member.summary: A code that identifies the type of staff member the room resident is, if applicable. Must be a valid resident staff indicator code in the target system.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.HousingAssignment.AddressBoxNumber
member.summary: The box number of the address associated with this housing assignment. Passing this attribute as null or blank will not produce a blank box number in Colleague. The removeBoxNumber query parameter must passed as true to erase an existing box number, or to create a new housing assignment with no box number. Colleague may be configured to automatically assign a box number when a housing assignment is created or updated. When this argument is passed as null or blank and removeBoxNumber is not true, Colleague will automatically assign a box number as configured. If Colleague does not automatically assign a box number, any existing box number will remain on the address when this argument is passed as null or blank and removeBoxNumber is not true. When a box number is supplied in this attribute, it supersedes any box number that Colleague would automatically create. This attribute can only be supplied when Colleague is configured to maintain addresses with housing assignments.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment
member.summary: A meal plan assignment.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier of the meal plan assignment in the target system. This must be blank or not supplied when creating a new meal plan assignment. This or an External Id must be specified when updating an existing meal plan assignment.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.ExternalIds
member.summary: One or more unique External Ids for the meal plan assignment.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.PersonId
member.summary: The identifier in the target system of the person assigned to the meal plan. Required.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.MealPlanId
member.summary: The identifier in the target system of the meal plan to which the person is assigned. Required.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.NumberOfRatePeriods
member.summary: Number of Rate Periods of the meal plan assignment. The particular rate period, Term, Weekly, etc., is specified in the Meal Plan in the target system specified by the MealPlanId property. Required.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.StartDate
member.summary: The start date of the meal plan assignment. Required.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.EndDate
member.summary: The end date of the meal plan assignment.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.CurrentStatusCode
member.summary: The current status of the meal plan assignment. Must be a valid meal plan assignment status code in the target system. Required.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.CurrentStatusDate
member.summary: The effective date of the current status of the meal plan assignment. Required.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.TermId
member.summary: The term id of the meal plan assignment. Must be a valid term id in the target system.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.UsedRatePeriods
member.summary: Number of Rate Periods Used of the meal plan assignment. If billing is performed by the target system, this optional value is only applied when the Current Status Code represents an early termination status.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.UsedPercent
member.summary: Percentage of the meal plan used. If billing is performed by the target system, this optional value is only applied when the Current Status Code represents an early termination status.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.CardNumber
member.summary: The card number associated with the meal plan assignment

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.OverrideRate
member.summary: An override rate that replaces the rate specified with the Meal Plan in the target system. The override rate is per units used.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.OverrideRateReason
member.summary: A reason code for an override rate. Must be a valid override reason code in the target system.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.OverrideChargeCode
member.summary: An override AR code for the meal plan assignment charge. Only used if billing is performed by the target system, in which case it replaces the value that would otherwise be assigned by the target system. Must be a valid AR code in the target system.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.OverrideReceivableType
member.summary: An override AR type code for the meal plan assignment charge. Only used if billing is performed by the target system, in which case it replaces the value that would otherwise be assigned by the target system. Must be a valid AR type code in the target system.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.OverrideRefundFormula
member.summary: An override refund formula code for the meal plan assignment. Only used if billing is performed by the target system, in which case it replaces the value that would otherwise be assigned by the target system. Must be a valid refund formula code in the target system.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.MealPlanAssignment.Comments
member.summary: Comments about the meal plan assignment.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.ReceivableCharge
member.summary: A charge against a receivable account

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.ReceivableCharge.Code
member.summary: Charge code

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.ReceivableCharge.Description
member.summary: Charge description

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.ReceivableCharge.BaseAmount
member.summary: Base amount of charge (pre-tax amount)

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.ReceivableInvoice

member.summary: Invoice description

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.ReceivableInvoice.Charges
member.summary: List of charges on this invoice

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.ReceivableTransaction
member.summary: A generic receivables transaction

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.ReceivableTransaction.ExternalIdentifier
member.summary: The identifier of the transaction in the external system

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.ReceivableTransaction.PersonId
member.summary: ID of the person for whom the transaction was made

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.ReceivableTransaction.TermId

member.summary: Date the transaction was made

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.ReceivableTransaction.Location
member.summary: ID of the location the transaction was made

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.ResidenceLifeExternalId
member.summary: An ID/Source pair that comprise a unique external ID for a residence life entity

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.ResidenceLifeExternalId.ExternalId
member.summary: The unique identifier of the entity in the external system.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.ResidenceLifeExternalId.ExternalIdSource
member.summary: The source of ExternalId. Must be a valid source code in the target system.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.RoomRatePeriods
member.summary: Room rate periods for a housing assignment.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.RoomRatePeriods.Daily
member.summary: Rate applied per day

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.ResidenceLife.RoomRatePeriods.Weekly
